home.job: A Freelance Full Stack Web Developer
home.quote: If you try, you have a 50% chance of success and 50% chance of failure. But if you don't try, you only have a 100% chance of failure.

about.description: Fresh graduate student from Informatics Engineering study program with GPA 3.89 out of 4.00. Have internship experience as a Web Developer at PT Digital Otoma Solusi for 4 months using Laravel and Vue.js frameworks to develop Data Center Infrastructure Management application.

projects.title: Web-Based Project Management Application
projects.description: This application is built using Tailwind CSS, Alpine.js, Laravel & Livewire frameworks (TALL Stack).

projects.title: Web-Based Blog Application
projects.description: This application is built using Vue.js 3 framework, Start Bootstrap template and Firebase.

projects.title: Web-Based Online Donation Application
projects.description: This application is built using Laravel framework, Tailwind CSS framework and Payment Gateway Midtrans.
